Strength of Ten.name: Strength of Ten
Strength of Ten.fullText:
Questing Knight Attack 11Strength of Ten

Your conviction lends you the force to repel nearby foes.

Encounter        Divine, Force, Weapon
Standard Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target is also subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.

Effect: After the attack, you shift to a square within the blast.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 103.
Strength of Ten.flavor: Your conviction lends you the force to repel nearby foes.

Quester’s Discipline.name: Quester’s Discipline
Quester’s Discipline.fullText:
Questing Knight Utility 12Quester’s Discipline

Deceit, despair, and weakness find no purchase in your heart.

Daily        Divine
No Action      Personal

Trigger: An attack that would blind, daze, dominate, stun, or weaken you hits you

Effect: The triggering attack’s conditions are negated against you.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 103.
Quester’s Discipline.flavor: Deceit, despair, and weakness find no purchase in your heart.

Virtuous Wrath.name: Virtuous Wrath
Virtuous Wrath.fullText:
Questing Knight Attack 20Virtuous Wrath

Your unflinching dedication is a dreadful bane to your enemies, who recoil from the strike.

Daily        Divine, Fear, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares. The target is weakened (save ends).


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 103.
Virtuous Wrath.flavor: Your unflinching dedication is a dreadful bane to your enemies, who recoil from the strike.
